Activity: Log in to the EHR system, check emails, and review new input from the previous day.
Conduct a team meeting with all relevant members to discuss project deadlines and updates.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the progress on the EHR system for the next leadership meeting.
Finalize the presentation and send it to team members for feedback.
Collaborate with @Trainer on developing user training materials based on the latest system enhancements.
Test the new features implemented during the week in a controlled environment.
Summarize day's accomplishments and prepare a report for tomorrow's goals.
